interest.description: How interested the customer is in buying a car

urgency.description: How soon the customer needs to buy

availability.description: How flexible the customer's schedule is

trust.description: How much the customer trusts the dealership

commitment.description: How ready the customer is to take the next step

rapport.description: Build relationship and trust with customer

qualify.description: Learn about customer needs and preferences

show_inventory.description: Show available cars that match customer needs

handle_concerns.description: Address customer worries about price, reliability, etc.

create_urgency.description: Create time pressure with limited offers or popular models

social_proof.description: Show that other customers have bought and are happy

offer_incentives.description: Offer special deals, financing, or free services

book_appointment.description: Try to book an appointment with the customer

type_0.name: Cautious Buyer
type_0.description: Takes time to decide, needs lots of information

type_1.name: Price Shopper
type_1.description: Very focused on getting the best deal

type_2.name: Ready Buyer
type_2.description: Already knows what they want, ready to buy

type_3.name: Research Buyer
type_3.description: Wants to learn everything before deciding

type_4.name: Impulse Buyer
type_4.description: Makes quick decisions, easy to convince

type_5.name: Skeptical Buyer
type_5.description: Hard to convince, needs lots of proof
